reason: Plan fully designed with 38 atomic steps across 8 phases. Goals and success criteria set. Architecture decisions documented. Ready for implementation starting with Phase 0 (Clean Slate).

data.plan_summary: Created 38 atomic steps across 8 phases (Phase 0-7). Phase 0 removes all legacy artifacts. Phase 1 aligns NDJSON protocol. Phase 2 implements new memory_terminal tool surface with progress notifications. Phase 3 builds real TCP adapter. Phase 4 adds system tray-resident GUI. Phase 5 adds structured output persistence. Phase 6 validates container support. Phase 7 provides comprehensive testing.
